name: sysdigcloud
postInstallNotes:
Sysdigcloud on DCOS installed successfully.
Your cluster metrics will be available shortly at https://app.sysdigcloud.com.
postUninstallNotes: Sysdigcloud on DCOS is uninstalled successfully.
preInstallNotes:
Configure your Sysdigcloud Access Key as a package option (sysdigcloud.access_key).
Also configure the number of Mesos slaves as an option (sysdigcloud.instances).
Marathon will ensure that the Sysdigcloud agent runs only once per slave.
